game.title: Lost Artifact Quest
game.objective: Find and Retrieve Ancient Artifact from Forgotten Temple
game.description: You are tasked with discovering the temple and acquiring the artifact, navigating through treacherous traps and guardians.

task.description: Follow the map given by the quest giver to locate the entrance in the Heart Woods.
Unravel the riddle at the Temple Entrance to gain access.
Confront and overcome temple guards and puzzles to reach the inner sanctum and secure the artifact.
